title: How is life at ICT, Mumbai? - Quora

response.answer_text: Life at ICT Mumbai is actually fun and happening. It's a mixture of both highs and lows but awesome specially when you are a hosteller. The life at ICT hostels is really crazy and you will love it to the core. Late-night groupings, late night studies, rash birthday parties and just dancing and playing around is actually fun and memorable for life. Add to the fact that ICT Mumbai is situated at Matunga - one of the top 5 posh and urban places in Mumbai. There are a lot of food joints (specially South Indian food) at King Circle that is hardly located 5 minute walking distance from the college gate. Most of the professors at ICT are really cool but some of them can be a pain at times. The workload is kind of a bit on the higher side. Also, there are a lot of practicals and biometric attendance can irritate you sometimes. Overall, it's really a great place to be in whether you are serious about studies or extra co-curricular activities or music or painting or whatever, the college will provide you all the ample opportunities and network to make a mark. All you have to do is a bit of hard work and owing to the location advantage at Mumbai, you have everything at your disposal.

I am myself research student from ICT. So i guess I can tell you better about it. ICT is full of life. Once you enter in ICT campus, you won’t feel like going back home again. ICT has everything you want from study in chemical fieldBrand value of ICT is big very big. Once, you have that brand name associated with you, your value goes up as compared to your friends from other institutes.Research projects - Like most of your BE/ M.Tech/ Phd proects are real life company projects so you know what is going in industries and how chemical industry works.ICT Alumina - ICT has big name list in its Alumina Association like 1) Mukesh Ambani - Reliance 2) N.K Parekh - Pidilite 3) Dr. Vinod Shah - Chembond Chemicals LTD4) Dr. Reddy - Reddy’s Lab5) Gharda - Gharda Chemicals…..Many more trust me there are more than 1000 of businessman who started their business after passing out and 100s of businessman whose companies turnover are more than 100 croresICT is not only about Studies it has Football Turf, Basket Ball, Badminton court, Cricket court, Lawn Tennis Court and many more.Professors have great experience about chemical industries many professors are Padma Bhushan/ Padmashri etc…So join it if you get admission in it because it is BEST
